title: LettError's Christmas Toy
content:
Erik van Blokland latest project, an online font editor.  
Demo link: [http://erik.letterror.com:8306/glyphServer](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012031832/http:/erik.letterror.com:8306/glyphServer)

comments.content: Wow. Now how am I supposed to get any work done?
